tier.item: Tapahina ny tady Voatapaka ny tady
cut-TT DET cord VOA-cut DET cord
`The cord was cut.' `The cord was cut.'

(5) a. Tapahin'ny lehilahy ny tady b. Voatapaky ny antsy ny tady
